item.title: 高盛首席执行官所罗门称今年 "零 "降息
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）表示，他目前预计美联储今年不会降息，因为政府支出已证明经济更具韧性。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer David Solomon said he currently expects that the Federal Reserve won’t cut interest rates this year, amid an economy that’s proved more resilient thanks to government spending.】

item.title: CVC和ADIA确认可能收购Hargreaves Lansdown
item.description: 一个私募股权收购财团证实，正在考虑对投资管理公司 Hargreaves Lansdown Plc 提出收购要约。【原文：A consortium of private equity buyers confirmed that it is considering a possible offer for investment manager Hargreaves Lansdown Plc.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行聘请美国银行的大卫-金（David King）担任全球技术管理与市场营销主管
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）已任命美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的大卫-金（David King）为技术并购业务全球主管。【原文：Barclays Plc has tapped Bank of America Corp.’s David King as global head of its technology mergers and acquisitions business.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司取消出售另外五家炼油厂的计划
item.description: 巴西石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）与巴西反垄断监管机构达成协议，在公司准备扩建设施之际，保留尚未出售的炼油厂。【原文：Petroleo Brasileiro SA reached a deal with Brazil’s antitrust watchdog to keep oil refineries it hasn’t already sold as the company gears up to expand its facilities.】

item.title: 富兰克林的 Admiral 收购公司以 18.5 亿美元收购 Acuren
item.description: 由连续交易商马丁-富兰克林（Martin Franklin）创办的海军上将收购有限公司（Admiral Acquisition Ltd.）已同意以 18.5 亿美元的价格收购工业服务提供商 ASP Acuren Holdings Inc.【原文：Admiral Acquisition Ltd., a vehicle started by serial dealmaker Martin Franklin, has agreed to buy industrial-services provider ASP Acuren Holdings Inc. for $1.85 billion in the largest blank-check deal this year.】

item.title: Citgo 的委内瑞拉母公司考虑在美国破产以减缓出售速度
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，委内瑞拉反对派正在权衡让 Citgo 石油公司的控股公司在美国申请破产，从而延缓出售其控制下的石油资产。【原文：Venezuela’s opposition is weighing a move that would slow the sale of oil assets under its control by having Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s holding company file for bankruptcy in the US, according to people familiar with the deliberations.】

item.title: 创纪录的黄金和铜价也是秘鲁非法采矿业的福音
item.description: 创纪录的黄金和铜价让本周齐聚秘鲁首都的矿业领袖们精神振奋。【原文：Record prices of gold and copper are buoying the spirits of mining leaders gathered in the Peruvian capital this week.】

item.title: Two Sigma 任命 Nekmouche 为人工智能战略负责人，Baron 辞职
item.description: 两希投资公司（Two Sigma Investments LP）选中阿里-米兰-内克穆什（Ali-Milan Nekmouche）领导一个新的人工智能和机器学习团队，这家市值 600 亿美元的对冲基金正寻求利用可为传统量化投资增效的技术。【原文：Two Sigma Investments LP picked Ali-Milan Nekmouche to head a new artificial intelligence and machine learning team, as the $60 billion hedge fund seeks to tap technology that could supercharge traditional quant investing.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州豪华护理机构将借款 2.6 亿美元用于扩建
item.description: 在伊恩飓风造成多达 8500 万美元的损失后不到两年，美国最大的单址非营利性退休社区正在出售市政债券，为扩建提供资金。【原文：The largest single-site, not-for-profit retirement community in the US is selling municipal bonds to finance an expansion, less than two years after Hurricane Ian caused as much as $85 million of damages.】

item.title: 投资者因干预和美联储担忧而看淡巴西股市
item.description: 由于担心政治干预和更多的政府支出，再加上美国利率长期走高的前景引发的风险偏好下降，投资者对巴西股市的看法变得更加悲观。【原文：Investors are turning more pessimistic on Brazilian equities as fears of political intervention and more government spending add to the lower appetite for risk sparked by the outlook of higher-for-longer rates in the US.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Caledonia 因巨额 Zillow 赌注下滑 26% 而陷入困境
item.description: 澳大利亚最大、最神秘的对冲基金之一坚持高度集中押注 Zillow Group Inc.【原文：One of Australia’s largest and most secretive hedge funds is sticking with its highly concentrated bet on Zillow Group Inc., predicting a sharp rally after the shares lost more than a quarter of their value this year.】

item.title: 七月大选将推迟英国向公众出售 NatWest 股票的计划
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，在首相苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）宣布将于 7 月 4 日举行大选后，英国政府向公众出售 NatWest Group Plc 股份的计划已被搁置。【原文：The UK government’s plans to sell shares in NatWest Group Plc to the public are now on hold after Prime Minister Rishi Sunak called a general election for July 4, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国铁路为价值 150 亿欧元的物流部门招标
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德国铁路股份公司已经收到了几份对其德铁信可物流部门的确认出价，在今年欧洲最大的交易之一中，该部门的出价可能超过 150 亿欧元（160 亿美元）。【原文：Deutsche Bahn AG has received a handful of confirmatory bids for its DB Schenker logistics unit, which could fetch more than €15 billion ($16 billion) in one of Europe’s largest deals this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尼日利亚利用债券为欠中央银行的 34 亿美元债务再融资
item.description: 尼日利亚已发行债券，为拖欠中央银行的 4.9 万亿奈拉（34 亿美元）债务再融资，以分散债务偿还负担。【原文：Nigeria has issued bonds to refinance 4.9 trillion naira ($3.4 billion) owed to the central bank in a bid to spread out the burden of debt repayments.】

item.title: 全球速溶咖啡豆将进入第四个短缺年
item.description: 世界顶级咖啡贸易商之一 Volcafe 有限公司认为，由于头号生产国越南继续面临干旱天气，速溶咖啡使用的罗布斯塔咖啡豆将出现 "史无前例 "的第四年短缺。【原文：Volcafe Ltd., one of the world’s top coffee traders, sees an “unprecedented” fourth year of deficits for robusta beans used in instant coffee, as top producer Vietnam continues to face dry weather.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告纽约债务法转变将使新兴市场债券重整复杂化
item.description: 国际货币基金组织警告说，纽约州提出的立法有可能使新兴市场的债务重组复杂化并延长时间。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is warning that legislation proposed in New York state risks complicating and prolonging emerging-market debt restructurings.】

item.title: 富达停止欧洲直接借贷活动，让团队成员离职
item.description: 富达国际（Fidelity International）发言人称，该公司已停止其欧洲直接借贷活动，并解雇了其私人市场团队的成员。【原文：Fidelity International has halted its European direct lending activities and let go members of its private markets team, according to a spokesperson for the firm.】

item.title: 智利计划出售全球比索债务并回购债券
item.description: 智利计划今年第二次利用国际债务市场，回购部分全球比索债券。【原文：Chile is planning to tap international debt markets for the second time this year as it offer to buy back some of its global peso bonds.】

item.title: 德国太阳能电池板饱和导致收入暴跌
item.description: 随着太阳能发电的大量涌入，德国的电价在一天中阳光最充足的时段出现暴跌，这可能会抑制盈利能力。【原文：German electricity prices are collapsing during the sunniest hours of the day as the country is flooded with solar power, potentially curbing profitability.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚在债务中止后仅汇回 10%的贷款还款
item.description: 据埃塞俄比亚财政部长艾哈迈德-希德（Ahmed Shide）称，在 2023 年达成的债务中止协议给了埃塞俄比亚一些喘息的机会后，该国在本财政年度前九个月仅偿还了 10%的到期贷款。【原文：Ethiopia made only 10% of loan repayments that were due in the first nine months of the country’s fiscal year after a debt suspension agreement reached in 2023 gave it some respite, according to Finance Minister Ahmed Shide.】

item.title: 嘉能可保留俄罗斯铝合同，但金属流动枯竭
item.description: Glencore Plc 将与俄罗斯铝业巨头 United Co.Rusal International PJSC 的合同至少再延长一年，即使销售量正在减少。【原文：Glencore Plc is keeping its contract with Russian aluminum giant United Co. Rusal International PJSC for at least another year, even as sales volumes dwindle.】

item.title: 加拿大银行监管机构警告 2026 年将出现住房支付冲击
item.description: 加拿大银行业监管机构警告说，许多在大流行病期间利率接近于零时办理抵押贷款的房主，很快就会因为这些贷款的续期而面临清算。【原文：Canada’s banking watchdog warned that many homeowners who took out mortgages when rates were near zero during the pandemic will soon face a reckoning as those loans renew.】

item.title: 希腊海军演习并未立即阻止俄罗斯石油输送
item.description: 当地海军再次发出通知，将在希腊南部海域进行演习，迫使油轮驶离该海域，但油轮仍在继续转运俄罗斯石油。【原文：Tankers continued switching cargoes of Russian petroleum even as they were forced out of waters off southern Greece when the local navy re-issued a notice that it would carry out exercises in the area.】

item.title: 美联储 2025 年加息？亚当-波森给华尔街带来新风险
item.description:
大选结束后，无论谁获胜，支出都会增加，因此请做好应对通胀压力的准备

。【原文：

Spending will flow after the election, no matter who wins — so get ready for inflationary pressure

】

item.title: 巴西 Suzano 公司确认对国际纸业资产感兴趣
item.description: 全球最大的纸浆生产商 Suzano SA 确认有意收购美国包装巨头国际纸业公司（International Paper Co.【原文：Suzano SA, the world’s largest pulp producer, confirmed its interest in buying US packaging giant International Paper Co.’s assets, while reiterating that no agreement has been made.】

item.title: 信贷市场自 2020 年以来首次发生变化
item.description:
更多评级下调至垃圾级的风险。【原文：

More risk of downgrades to junk.

】

item.title: 米莱改革后，铜矿狂潮吸引矿业巨头涌入阿根廷
item.description: 包括隆丁矿业公司（Lundin Mining Corp.）、嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）和第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）在内的全球重量级矿业公司正大举进军阿根廷，因为新政府有意吸引外资，推动这些公司比以往任何时候都更接近于在红彤彤的安第斯山脉开辟巨大的铜矿。【原文：Global mining heavyweights including Lundin Mining Corp., Glencore Plc and First Quantum Minerals Ltd. are piling into Argentina as a new government intent on luring foreign investment propels the companies closer than ever to opening up vast copper deposits in the red-hued Andes.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会因纽约证券交易所所有者未及时报告黑客攻击事件罚款 1,000 万美元
item.description: 洲际交易所公司（拥有纽约证券交易所）同意支付 1,000 万美元，以了结美国证券交易委员会的指控，即该交易所巨头未能立即向美国证券交易委员会通报其系统在 2021 年遭到黑客攻击的情况。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange, Inc., which owns the New York Stock Exchange, agreed to pay $10 million to settle Securities and Exchange Commission allegations that the exchange giant failed to immediately tell the SEC about a hack of its systems in 2021.】

item.title: 在美国提出建议后，法国力争七国集团就俄罗斯资产达成协议
item.description: 法国政府支持美国为乌克兰利益动用被冻结的俄罗斯资产的提议，从而提高了本周在七国集团财长会议上达成协议的前景。【原文：The French government backed a US a proposal to tap frozen Russian assets for Ukraine’s benefit, raising the prospect of a deal this week at a meeting of Group of Seven finance ministers.】

item.title: 盎格鲁拒绝 490 亿美元收购要约后与必和必拓展开谈判
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）在拒绝了价值 386 亿英镑（490 亿美元）的第三项提议后，同意与规模更大的竞争对手必和必拓集团（BHP Group）进行谈判，首次为十多年来最大的矿业交易打开了大门。【原文：Anglo American Plc agreed to enter talks with larger rival BHP Group after rejecting a third proposal worth £38.6 billion ($49 billion), opening the door for the first time to what would be the biggest mining deal in over a decade.】
